value:
I hoped to find the power I seek
at this harvest festival... But it seems
that was a mistake.

Festivals are nothing more than
a brief reprieve from despair.
The vain struggle of a worm...

Submit or suffer!$k$p...Must I say "trick or treat"?
How dull.

If you intend to play a trick on me,
it will be your last. Such foolishness
is absolutely intolerable.

Costumes are a fool's amusement.
Who was it who said it would be
enjoyable, again? I'll kill them first.

The castle I'm visiting from is
lively with harvest festivities.
You ought to come...$k$pAnd witness the despair that
awaits $Nf...

Candy or death. I can choose for you,
if you'd prefer.
Retribution for every little trick...

I refuse to let sugary sweets be
my downfall...

I suspect you have more of these
hidden away... If you hand over all
such treats, your life will be spared.

I am the Fell Dragon Grima, bringer
of despair and ruin... Let us bathe
this harvest festival in true darkness.

Enjoy your short lives while you
can, worms. Before long, utter
darkness will smother you...$k$pAlthough... These sweets are
quite palatable. Subtle sweetness
with a delicate mouthfeel, I—$k$pYah! How long have you been
there, $Nu?!$k$pWhat did you hear?! No, nothing!
There was nothing TO hear. Yes.$k$pI wish to harvest ruin and despair.
Sweets harbor no interest for me.$k$pBut next time the harvest festival
comes around, I expect an invitation.$k$pPromise me, lest I am forced to
destroy this world. You understand...
でやっ
消します
ああっ…
生意気な…
Your candy will be mine!
Your efforts are futile.
Prepare to be eaten.
I will rend you apart!
How...can this be?
ふん…
This outfit? Pah. More of your garish frivolity.
You would pester me? Dare to touch my ears and I'll take that finger.
Of course worthless worms with nothing better to do would waste their time on a harvest festival.
This is a harvest festival, so let's separate the wheat from the chaff. You humans are the latter.
Help me recover the rest of my memories and I'll shower you in so much candy that your teeth will rot.
I am Grima... I am despair... And I...am not enjoying this festival...
Am I having fun? What about my appearance makes you think I'm having FUN, worm?!
Good!
Show me my prey.
I will end them.
